channel.title: Keep the text showing?

item.title: Keep the text showing?
item.dc:creator: @gazer11 gazer11
item.description:
@gazer11 wrote:

On the top of my server, everytime you teleport the text I want to show up will show up but as soon as you walk it dissapears. I’m guessing I would change something in:

        sendFrame126("@gra@Players - " + players, 6570);
        sendFrame126("@red@Gazscape V3", 6572);
        sendFrame126("", 6664);
        setInterfaceWalkable(6673); // 6673}}}
        // setInterfaceWalkable(14600);//201

But which bit?

-Gaz

Read full topic
